description:
Hachiman continues his solitary lifestyle by using his skills to ensure he is left alone during gym and lunch.  His routine is broken by the appearance of Saika Tosuka, who has come 
to him with a request.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le dieu des comédies d`amour est parfois clément.
Sometimes the Gods of Rom-Coms Does Nice Things.
Tama ni Lovecome no Kamisama wa Ii Koto o Suru.
たまにラブコメの神様はいいことをする.
